metadata.title: Daily Sweat - AI Workout Planner
metadata.description: Your personal AI-powered workout planner. Generate custom routines, track progress, and get fit!

footer.tagline: Â© {year} Daily Sweat. Sweat Smarter, Not Harder.

workoutModal.kcalBurnedPlaceholder: Estimated Kcal Burned: Calculation coming soon.

workoutGenerator.title: Create Your Workout
workoutGenerator.description: Tell us your preferences, and we'll generate a personalized workout plan for you.

workoutDisplay.title: Your Workout Plan
workoutDisplay.emptyState: Generate a workout plan using the form to see it here.
workoutDisplay.noExercises: No exercises in this plan. Try generating a new one!

activeWorkoutDisplay.title: Active Workout Session
activeWorkoutDisplay.noCurrentExercise: No current exercise. This shouldn't happen!
activeWorkoutDisplay.exerciseCompleteMessage: Complete the exercise timer to enable rest.

difficultyFeedback.title: Rate Your Workout
difficultyFeedback.description: Help us improve your next workout by rating the difficulty of this plan.

workoutHistory.title: Workout History
workoutHistory.emptyState: No past workouts found. Complete some workouts to see them here!

restTimer.title: Rest Timer
restTimer.description: Take a breather, then hit it hard!

chatbot.dialogDescription: Ask any fitness or nutrition related questions.
chatbot.initialMessage: Hello! I'm Daily Sweat AI. Ask me anything about fitness, nutrition, or your workouts!
chatbot.errorMessage: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.

toasts.workoutGeneratedDescription: Your personalized workout plan is ready.
toasts.restOverDescription: Time to get back to work!
toasts.workoutEndedDescription: Your workout session has ended early.
toasts.exerciseTimeUpDescription: Time for the next part of your exercise or rest.

errors.invalidAIPlan: Received an invalid workout plan format from AI.
errors.emptyAIPlan: The AI generated an empty workout plan.
errors.invalidAdjustedAIPlan: Received an invalid adjusted workout plan format from AI.
errors.emptyAdjustedAIPlan: The AI adjusted to an empty workout plan.
